wikipedia_page.main: Mary Barclay (20 July 1916 – 19 February 2008) was an English film, television and theatre actress. She was best known for playing Stella Dane in the Crossroads television series, as well as her role in the 1973 film, A Touch of Class.

response: * Born: Mary Barclay, English actress, best known as Stella Dane in the British soap opera Crossroads, in Williton, Somerset, England (d. 2008); Jean-Jacques Bertrand, Canadian politician, 21st Premier of Quebec, in Sainte-Agathe-des-Monts, Quebec (d. 1973); Johnny Morris, Welsh TV personality, best known as the host for children's shows based on zoology including Animal Magic and Tales of the Riverbank, in Newport, Wales (d. 1999)
